query.sql:
with
boss as (select av_b.number_value from attribute_value as av_b join card as c_b on av_b.card_id = c_b.card_id and c_b.template_id = 544 and c_b.status_id = 4 join attribute_value as av_assist on av_assist.card_id = av_b.card_id and av_assist.attribute_code = 'JBR_ARM_ASSISTANT' and av_assist.number_value = (%CURRENTUSERS%)
where av_b.attribute_code = 'JBR_ARM_MANAGER' )
select distinct crds.card_id
from ( select c.card_id from card as c -- по поручению join attribute_value as av_0 on av_0.card_id = c.card_id and attribute_code = 'ADMIN_702311' -- соисполнители join attribute_value as av_1 on av_1.card_id = av_0.number_value and av_1.attribute_code = 'ADMIN_255974' -- исполнитель join attribute_value as av_2 on av_2.card_id = av_1.card_id and av_2.attribute_code = 'JBR_INFD_EXEC_LINK' and av_2.number_value = (select number_value from boss)
where c.template_id = 1044 and c.status_id = 206
union all
select c.card_id from card as c -- по поручению join attribute_value as av_0 on av_0.card_id = c.card_id and attribute_code = 'ADMIN_702311' -- исполнитель join attribute_value as av_1 on av_1.card_id = av_0.number_value and av_1.attribute_code = 'JBR_INFD_EXEC_LINK' -- подписант join attribute_value as av_2 on av_2.card_id = av_1.card_id and av_2.attribute_code = 'JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK' and av_2.number_value = (select number_value from boss)
where c.template_id = 1044 and c.status_id = 206
union all
select c.card_id from card as c -- по поручению join attribute_value as av_0 on av_0.card_id = c.card_id and attribute_code = 'ADMIN_702311' -- исполнитель join attribute_value as av_1 on av_1.card_id = av_0.number_value and av_1.attribute_code = 'JBR_INFD_EXEC_LINK' -- контролер join attribute_value as av_2 on av_2.card_id = av_1.card_id and av_2.attribute_code = 'JBR_TCON_INSPECTOR' and av_2.number_value = (select number_value from boss) -- поручение контрольное join attribute_value as av_3 on av_3.card_id = av_1.card_id and av_3.attribute_code in ('JBR_TCON_ONCONT', 'JBR_IMPL_ONCONT') and av_3.value_id in (1449, 1432)
where c.template_id = 1044 and c.status_id = 206
) as crds
